title: See inside Alcatraz as Trump calls to reopen prison
shortDescription: Trump has called for the reopening of Alcatraz, which was designated a museum and historic site after closing more than 60 years ago.

title: Proposal to axe Head Start excluded from Trump's budget
shortDescription: The White House reneged on a plan to zero out funding for Head Start, a preschool program relied on by hundreds of thousands of low-income families.

title: Trump admin offers $1,000 to migrants who self-deport using CBP One app
shortDescription: The move is the latest part of President Donald Trump’s effort to crack down on illegal immigration.

title: 19 states sue Trump administration for overhauling HHS, staff cuts
shortDescription: RFK Jr. announced a massive restructuring plan including the consolidation of divisions from 28 to 15 and elimination of 20,000 full-time employees

title: First it was dolls. Trump now says kids don't need '250 pencils.'
shortDescription: 'I don't think that a beautiful baby girl needs – that's 11 years old – needs to have 30 dolls,' Trump said, defending his tariffs. Also: five pencils are fine.

title: GOP Rep. Mike Lawler hosts rowdy town hall, police eject woman
shortDescription: New York Republican Mike Lawler faced a rowdy town hall on attendees broke out into boos and a constituent was forcibly removed by police.

title: Trump says 'I don't know' when asked if he must uphold Constitution
shortDescription: Plus: What activists say about Trump's first 100 days in office setting back civil rights protections. | New findings on the dangers of plastic.

title: President Trump floats reopening of Alcatraz
shortDescription: President Donald Trump floated the idea of reopening and expanding the infamous Alcatraz prison as he expressed frustration with judges.

title: Trump wants to reopen Alcatraz. What is it and why did it close?
shortDescription: President Trump said on May 4 he wants to reopen the infamous Alcatraz prison. It closed in 1963 because it was too expensive to operate.

title: Reopen The Rock? Trump's idea for Alcatraz has been tried before.
shortDescription: President Trump directed federal officials to open Alcatraz for detainees. It's not the first time the topic has cropped up.

title: White House softens Trump Hollywood tariff announcement
shortDescription: Trump said his administration would "immediately' begin 'implementing' a tariff on foreign films, but the White House said a decision isn't final.

title: 5 Republicans in Congress who defined Trump's first 100 days
shortDescription: These five lawmakers have stood out for their key roles on Capitol Hill during Trump's first 100 days in office this term.

title: Trump says 'highly unlikely' US uses military force to annex Canada
shortDescription: President Donald Trump still wants to annex Canada. But unlike Greenland, where he won't rule out military action, he doesn't see forcible seizure.

title: Trump says he would extend TikTok deadline if no deal reached by June 19
shortDescription: Trump has twice granted a reprieve from the enforcement of a congressionally mandated ban on TikTok that was initially due to take effect in January.

title: Trump directs the Bureau of Prisons to reopen Alcatraz
shortDescription: The federal prison at Alcatraz housed notorious U.S. criminals such as Al Capone before it closed in 1963.

title: Ex-Trump adviser Waltz in for 'brutal' hearing for UN job, Dems say
shortDescription: "I think it will be a brutal confirmation hearing," Sen. Mark Warner said of Mike Waltz. "I think he's going to have tough questions."

title: Trump unsure if he must uphold Constitution
shortDescription: President Trump said, "I don't know," when asked on NBC's "Meet the Press" if he must uphold the Constitution to execute his deportation strategy.

title: Australian prime minister claims election victory, riding anti-Trump wave
shortDescription: Australia’s Anthony Albanese claimed a historic second term as prime minister powered by voters' concerns about the influence of President Donald Trump.

title: Trump says he can't run again in 2028: 5 takeaways from new interview
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he takes responsibility for only the 'good parts' of the economy and said he's not looking to run for president in 2028.

title: White House posts AI image of Trump as the pope
shortDescription: The White House posted an AI-generated image of President Donald Trump dressed as the pope on X, sparking both backlash and glee.

title: Trump aides cheer Sovereignty's win over Journalism in Kentucky Derby
shortDescription: Junior Alvarado, the jockey who rode Sovereignty to victory over Journalism in the 151st Kentucky Derby, grew up in Venezuela.

title: Stephen A. Smith says he's glad to hear Donald Trump would 'love to see him run'
shortDescription: Stephen A. Smith characterized himself as a fiscal conservative and a social liberal, but said he would run for president as a Democrat.

title: Trump says he doesn't know if he must uphold Constitution
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said, "I don't know," when asked on NBC's "Meet the Press" whether he must uphold the Constitution to execute his deportation strategy.

title: Mexican president says she rejected Trump's offer to send US troops
shortDescription: Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum said on Saturday that U.S. President Donald Trump had proposed sending U.S. troops to Mexico to combat drug trafficking, but said she had rejected that offer because "sovereignty is not for sale."
